text: Target Canada is a former Canadian department store chain that took over most Zellers stores, it then ran out of money in April 2015 and closed all of all its stores. There was a total of 133 Target stores in Canada in 2015. It was formerly headquartered in Mississauga, Ontario. == Related pages == * Target Corporation (Target stores in the United States) == References == == Other websites == * Archived Official Website Category:Target Corporation Category:2011 establishments in Canada Category:2015 disestablishments in Canada Category:Companies based in Mississauga Category:Defunct companies of Canada Category:Department stores of Canada Category:Discount stores of Canada
title: Target Canada
